title: HOUR 3 - Cavaliers, Harden, LeBron or LeGone
itunes:title: HOUR 3 - Cavaliers, Harden, LeBron or LeGone
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, former NBA player Antoine Walker drops by to share his thoughts on the Cleveland Cavaliers and if their future involves one last stop from LeBron James, how new Sixer James Harden will mesh with his Philadelphia teammates, and the Howard-Gard skirmish. Finally, Colin closes the show with a new game, "LeBron Or LeGone."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
